p: The fact that European automobile manufacturers are mainly ‘all‐round enhancers’ would also explain why compared with the other clusters this strategy type's focus is much more on emission compensation. Companies with large manufacturing facilities in the EU are subject to higher regulatory pressure, as they are obliged to participate in the European ETS when a certain emission threshold is crossed. This applies to most of the European‐based OEMs and is underlined by the fact that on average ‘all‐round enhancers’ are the largest firms in the sample (Table 7).
